Description: Works effectively within established iOS or Android architectures, following current best practices
Example behaviour: Delivers features requiring simple local modifications, Adds simple actions that call server endpoints, Reuses existing components appropriately
Example task: Added existing button to a different iOS surface, Add follow button for publications on Androi, Fetched and displayed a new stream, using existing stream item styles

Description: Develops new instances of existing architecture, or minor improvements to existing architecture
Example behaviour: Defines new useful and appropriate proto-generated objects, Creates simple new activities on Android, Migrates code from old patterns to new pattern
Example task: Upgraded SDWebImage to a new major version, Added support for rendering a new type of stream item, Prototyped a simple new feature quickly

Description: Designs major new features and demonstrates a nuanced understanding of mobile platform constraints
Example behaviour: Implements complex features with a large product surface area, Works effectively with  Android reactive programming framework
Example task: Designed iOS caching strategy for offline reading

Description: Builds complex, reusable architectures that pioneer best practices and enable engineers to work more effectively
Example behaviour: Fixes subtle memory management issues, Implements interactive dismissals that bring delight
Example task: Upgraded CocoaPods to a new major version, Designed architecture for fetching and rendering stream items
